item.description:
With the return of the warmer weather there will be a mixed social tag rugby game starting up again this Sunday morning on the fields behind Harvard Stadium. It is non contact, similar to touch rugby and a great way to keep fit during the summer.

We play every Sunday morning with a very friendly, welcoming group of people, mainly expats from a variety of different rugby playing nations (Irish, French, Aussies and Kiwis). The standard is good for a social game and people of all skill levels are welcome to come along and give it a try. Once the evenings get a little longer we also have training on Thursday nights in Brookline near Coolidge Corner.

Anyone who wants to join please RSVP to this event so that we know you are coming and I will get the organisers to add you to the mailing list for future games. If you have any problems you can call me on 617 863 7390

group.name: The Boston Expat Aussie Meetup Group

item.name: Social tag rubgy
